Cary,
Isn't the 'yoshi' kanji missing one horizontal stroke that it needs to be
read 'nobu'?
Alan
----- Original Message -----
From: "Cary Condell" <condell@...>
To: <nihonto@yahoogroups.com>; <nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 23, 2003 3:17 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Milt - Hikone bori tsuba mei.


: Alan, Milt...
: Hikone bori tsuba mei can be read Nobumichi saku
: or Yoshimichi saku. In either case this mei is
: unrecorded in the Kinko Jiten, Wakayama (rev. Heisei 11).
:
: I'll try the fuchi mei tomorrow.
:
